item.title: 2016 Billboard Music Awards performers
item.description:
Meghan Trainor will perform at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards.

Sponsored:

item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
Meghan Trainor to perform at 2016 Billboard Music Awards Billboard Staff Updated 1921 GMT (0321 HKT) May 13, 2016 Singer Meghan Trainor will perform her new single at the Billboard Music Awards on May 22. (Billboard) Meghan Trainor will perform at the 2016 Billboard Music Awards. The chart-topping, Grammy-winning pop star will deliver a rendition of her feisty new retro-vibe hit "NO" at the May 22 gala. The first single lifted from her sophomore album Thank You, "NO" reached No. 3 on the Billboard Hot 100 last month.
